subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Baseball
Citi Field (NYC)
Yankee Stadium (NYC)
Shea Stadium (NYC)
lead_paragraph: The openings of Citi Field and Yankee Stadium are the culmination of nearly two decades when it appeared that no ballpark could possibly be built in New York City.
snippet: The openings of Citi Field and Yankee Stadium are the culmination of nearly two decades when it appeared that no ballpark could possibly be built in New York City.
